content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to my work. to get there, i pass a long line of short tree shrubs. it was around 4 in the afternoon- i saw suddenly zooming over the trees, a smaill- basket ball sized ufo- it was shining- and just flashing by- it has a strange pattern- it would stop and bob for a second or two and then keep going- 
it was a minute long flight over a mile = i thought earlier that day i heard a flashing,electronic sound in my ear. but i ignored it- i mentioned it- but after seeing the probe as i call it- i felt it was connected to the sound i had heard-
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a metallic ufo flying over the smalls trees in mcminnville

content.detailedDescription: My four friends and i go on walks on a farm basically right next to ones house. we walked around the farm, it was beautiful outside. nothing was out of the ordinary. when covering all the land over on the farm we continued to walk through the woods back to the house, no flash lights. when we were about 200 feet into the woods i noticed a very low flying object. i immidatly thought it was a plane because i saw three lights in the shape of a triangle. but this craft seemed to hover. it moved slowly, and quietly. what was strange about the craft was the sound. it sounded like a clean burning engine "from out of this world" like a fan on low. but the feeling it gave off was different. as if standing infront of a loud bass amp on full blast. pretned that this bass amp was on so loud it made your stomach turn vibrations could be felt in your feet, your ears, your eyes, your chest. but no immidate sound was around. just as if we were laying on a generator or something. it moved quietly infront of us, but behind trees. in a small clearing in the tree line all of our discriptions matched to perfection. the craft had three somewhat large white lights on the bottom of the craft along with one red, plasma like light in the middle of the craft. and it also looked like something was hanging out of the bottom, like a large tube (large in width, not length) the very front did not have any navigation lights, and there were no green lights. the verry back of the craft had 3 small white lights extremely bright surrounded by blue (this is very hard to discribe) it moved toward a local highway then it slowed down dramatically and turned toward the feilds in which we walked through, it could still be heard in the woods echoing everywhere. this was not our first experience with .. what we like to camm them "our friends" but we were in complete shock, as i saw that same looking ship or craft on tv hours before, talking about a triangle shaped craft in illinois in which 4 or 5 people saw. we lit up a cigg and walked home trying to think of plausable excusses for it. none were found.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large triangle object, threelights on bottom one red three on back pushing.

content.detailedDescription:
On this night, i walked into my back yard to watch the sky and meditate.  i was taking cleansing breaths and thanking the universe for all things. as i was watching the western sky, i felt the need to say to the space beings, "i know you are there, and you know that i know." at that instant i saw what looked like a satellite moving from the south to the northwest. there was no sound. then, it lit up like a very bright starburst for a moment and disappeared.  i continued to look at the sky for it another 10 minutes or so. several airplanes flew over going in different directions, but the other object did not reappear. that's when i felt that i had seen a ufo. this is not the first time i've watched a slowly moving star like object just didppear in the night sky behind my home.  but this time i recorded the event in my journal. on 12/01/09, i saw another slowly moving, satellite like object moving from north to south.  it appeared to be much higher in the sky and became obscured by clouds. on 12/10/09 i saw a large, glowing object moving from south to north at treetop level.  i was standing in the back yard and it was coming directly toward me. it had multicolored blinking lights, but made no sound. as it it moved over the field behind my house it disappeared among the trees.  i continued to look for it another 5 to ten minutes, but it was gone. i also, observed what looked like a fireball falling from northeast to the south on 11/25/09, while i was meditating in my back yard. i asked the space brothers to communicate with me and "wham", a fireball appeared.
  these things have all occurred between 6p.M. and 7:p.M cst, while i am outside meditating and communicating with the universe.
i have seen many ufos in my life, but i know some people will think i'm crazy.
content.summary: I saw what looked like a satellite moving nw from the south.  it burst into a bright light and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard taking pictures of the stars when i noticed an red orb floating. it faded in and out .The orb was changing colors from orange to red. it would stay on for 3 seconds fade out and reappear after 1 second. i watched it for a couple of minutes and setup my camera. the shutter speed was set for 8 seconds, the aperture was set on f5 and i believe the iso was set either at 1600 or 3200. i took the picture and the object disappered. i did not hear any sounds or notice anything else strange. the object was north of my location was about 45 degrees. it was a clear cool night.
content.summary: Witnessed an orange orb flashing on and off

content.detailedDescription: I was driving, north on cr 16b (rural area), to work approx. 6:50 am.  a very strange moving object was moving up in the sky to my left over a cattle field.  i pulled over and blinked my lights at it, and it seemed to blink back.  not really sure it was for me, as it blinked before.  two other cars passed me but didn't seem to notice it.  it moved and looked like several rubber bands, up, down, back and forth.  the color was beautiful, blue and white.  it amazed me at first then i became a little uncomfortable and left.  i truely believe it was not of this earth!!!!  then, about a week later, i was outside my home, in the yard at night, looked up and saw a very smaller version of the exact thing.  i went to get my husband, but the time he came outside it was gone.  i only wish that there is someone out there that saw the same thing or even a picture would be wonderful.
content.summary: Blue/white rubberband like..Moving frm lft to right, changing size back & forth

content.detailedDescription: I saw a reddish-orange stationary star-like object on the night sky as i entered the terrace. i thought, it is too big and bright to be mars so i took binoculars to watch it closely. i decided to go inside again in order to charge the camera battery and take an astronomical telescope. it was not there when i came back. after the sighting i drove outside the city to take a few nigh sky photographs. then i got to a pub where i told the story to some people.
content.summary: Reddish-orange stationary star-like object

content.detailedDescription: I was at the front yard with my dog when i looked up and saw a red-orange light hovering without any sound. i immediately tried to assess whether it was a plane or a helicopter. we see both of those often around here and i'm sure it wasn't either of them. it was at a high-flying chopper distance. it was at the northeastern direction from george mason university. i immediately called my family to witness this. i said "i think there's a ufo outside, you have to come and see this" they came and they saw it too. when my sister went back in to grab a camera, the light started fading out, slowly. it faded out and at last it seemed like a distant star and disappeared. when it was bright, it was about the size of 1/16th of a full moon.
content.summary: Hovering reddish-orange color light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was approximately 7 years old.  my bed faced the street.  i was awakened by light shining on my face through the window.  i saw a lighted object hovering on my street and i could see inside of it. 

i saw beings inside that looked as if they were covered in black nylon fabric and there were controls inside the ship.

i crawled out of my bed and got my mother.  she brought me back to my room and looked out the window.  she dismissed my claim as a bad dream and tucked me back into the bed.

after she left, i felt the light on my face again.  i opened my eyes and the object had returned.  once again, i crawled out of the bed and got my mother.

the object was gone and my mother didn't see anything outside.  she tucked me back in and stayed with me for a few moments, then returned to her bed.

it wasn't long when i felt light on my face for a third time and opened my eyes to see the object on the street outside of my window.  i crawled out of my bed and got my mother again.

when she came into my room, the object had disappeared, but when she pulled back the sheets to put me in the bed, static electricity filled the room.  my mother stayed with me after that.

the next morning, she asked me to make a drawing and color what i had seen.  i couldn't find the colors in my coloring box to match.  i did the best i could with carnation pink and cornflower blue.  

years later, i saw the colors that i had seen on the ship.  it was neon.
content.summary: A ufo with pink & blue neon lighting landed on my streeet.  i saw beings inside.

content.detailedDescription: The a.M. morning was clear and bright. i was walking in my parking lot and looked up at the sky. saw an unusual, colored object that was alone in the morning sky. the object was about 1.5 miles north-east of john wayne airport, stationary at about 3-500 feet in the air and approx. 1/4 mile from me. the object was quite near i-55 just east of the macarthur blvd. exit. it was as if it was observing the flight path of incoming planes, was a thought since it was in an excellent position to do this. lights red, blue, white, and green were dotted on the structure that appeared not to be circular but vertical and beam-like/rod-like. they did not blink. there were perhaps 7-8 from where i saw it. there was no sound. i stood to watch it for about 2 minutes and it hadn't moved or rotated. i tried to make notice if it was a helicopter but it did not at all look like one (no rotors, no tell-tale body shape)or any other aircraft as i inventoried my knowledge of aircraft. with regret, i was not able to watch it further but had to leave my area and i assume it remained. the sighting certainly left me questioning and frustrated that i was not at all able to remain with the sighting due to a pre-scheduled, medical appointment.
content.summary: Stationary, multicolor lights, approx. 3-500ft, silent, vertical structure

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking in the park when we noticed a few folks pointing up at the sky.  initially we thought they were observing some unique clouds, but we then saw what appeared to be a large black slow moving triangle in the sky.  it was higher than the lowest level of clouds, but not extremely high, though it was difficult to place it without anything else to compare it to.  it appeared to be changing shape as it moved across the sky, my husband suspected it was the light hitting it on different sides to the craft.  i called my father-in-law at his house, he had access to a telescope.  he later reported back to us that it was indeed changing shape.  his initial sighting was of a stealth shape triangle, but moving backwards!  as he watched it shifted into a rectangular box before floating into a cloud.  i snapped a cellphone picture of it, unfortunately it isn't very informative...
content.summary: Black, possibly shape shifting

content.detailedDescription:
It avails little if you laugh. the words of mr. alex collier of 20-mile ship at 1.5 mln miles off south pole were proved by a strange craft recorded on wwt and sky-map.Org before january 1st. (together with some smaller objects). after new year's day (exact day unknown)were recorded additional several big objects and smaller ones, again on both wwt and sky-map. google sky does not support the polar regions anyway. below are the coordinates, starting with the first object. i am attaching some more impressive photos. you would do better to download wwt worldwide online telescope and to continue monitoring the south pole region for newly appeared objects. there is nothing good in those ships, if you go thru all the et stuff on project camelot. most likely they are from either orion or draco empires, both reptiles and hostile. the human-looking pleiadians and andromedans seem still do not intervene and are somewhere beyond mars, most probably in saturn system. for more, check project camelot.

coordinates ra, dec

16 19 35, -88 43 10 - cylindrical object

02 26 39, -89 43 13 - circular
 
08 50 47, -89 38 09 - curved

14 38 50, -88 40 42 - curved

14 59 06, -88 21 24 - curved

23 13 00, -88 53 11 - curved

19 26 51, -88 42 38 - cylindrical, looking like ship with traces

alex collier's statements of 3 different objects:

1. cassini project classified, because of all the mothership activity filmed in saturn system.
2. a 1.5 mln miles off the south pole a 20 mile craft that is sat in a stationary. nasa and other organizations telescopes have been monitoring it for 8 months, they watch its trajectory to us. it is now
stationary and are craft going in and out of this 20-mile structure.
3. very large planetary structure coming in 18 degrees ra of neptune's orbit. it should be visible sometimes next year.
content.summary: Invading fleet detected on wwt off south pole region.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from mcdonalds with my girlfriend on clove road in montague new jersey. it was a starless night. i saw a light comung over the next hill and it came on very fast and i remember seeing heads in the windows. i do not remember the rest of the night. the next morning i went to the store to get newsapers to find out about the airplane crash. there was none.
content.summary: I thought it was an airplane that was going to crash way too low and slow.

content.detailedDescription:
------------------------------------------------------
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
------------------------------------------------------
from my back porch in kyle, texas (just south of austin) in mid-october 2009. it was during the day. the sky was bright blue with a few clouds. i was merely relaxing and looking at the pretty sky.


-----------------------------------------
2. what made you first notice the object?
-----------------------------------------
i noticed it because i just happened to be looking in its direction as it glided past.


---------------------------------------------------------------
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? 
---------------------------------------------------------------
it was an unfamiliar flying craft. by definition, that is "ufo." i did not make assumptions as to its origin or makeup.


---------------------------------------------------
4. describe the object and its actions and motions. 
---------------------------------------------------
i saw a flying object in a patch of blue sky unobstructed by clouds. i did not recognize the object, yet there it was--flying. it was close enough for me to tell it was not a helicopter, not an air balloon, not an airplane. i heard no noise coming from it. it was dark metallic and roundish, saturn-shaped, and not elegant or sleek. 

it was moving in a straight line, not stopping or slowing. it is hard to judge size or speed because there was nothing sufficiently close to it to judge scale.



-------------------------------------------------
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, 
during and after sighting the object. 
-------------------------------------------------
my reaction was "oh. i guess i have now seen a ufo." i have not told anyone. i know what i saw. 



----------------------------------------
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
----------------------------------------
it moved steadily and then disappeared into thin air. it was not suddenly obscured by a cloud. it *disappeared* before my eyes as i watched it. into clear blue sky.
content.summary: Saw flying object disappear in midair

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were going to supper in the kingfield maine area, rural, i saw a bright white ball appear suddenly over the trees traveling very fast. it was large and did not seem too far away. almost as though it were trying to hide quickly and get out of sight,it curved toward the earth and went behind the trees..... years ago i saw something that was alot like this ,only there were two of them and also at that time it seemed to have an intellience about its manuvers........I did not have to wonder what these objects were. i knew at first glance that they were not of our earth reality..I was not scared i wanted to go investigate but my husband is not as enthusiastic as i am about the unknown,,,,,
content.summary: A bright white ball of light that appeared to curve toward the earth and drop.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time i was about 14 or fifteen years old. it was a summer night and the moon was not full and there were no clouds. it was around 9 o'clock pm. the night was calm like it is in the summer here. i remember i was at home and i needed something in the backyard (can't remember what it was i went back there for though). i was next to the back fence in the backyard and i heard a low hum sound comming from the west and i looked up to see what it was. there were 3 large triangle shaped craft that were flying low in a v formation. they flew very slow at extremely low altitude. they were so close it felt as though i could touch them. they were black and each one had a red glowing light under each craft. that was the only light they each had. that was the only thing that made them visible. as they flew over my first thought was that they were f-117 because i can recall their shape and knew they also had a red light under the hule. of course as i got older and look back at this i don't think that the us air force would have the guys fly low and let alone have the capability to not be heard. as i saw them fly over i ran to the front yard where i could see them. as they were going over the neighborhood i saw them vanish over the house across the street. then 3 more flew over in the same v patern. i ran inside and told my parents with extreme enthusiasm "stealth fights flew over the house". they all laughed and asked me again what?
 there size was difficult to determine but i think they were about 200 feet from the ground.
content.summary: They looked like f-117's but they were silent and much bigger

content.detailedDescription: Sighted as i was walking my dog in front of my parent's house. the object is still in the air as i type this report, and continues to rise slowly.  it appears as an orange light from a distance, but with binoculars it is visible as a triangle or maybe a "p" shape.  it rises slowly, but is also moving very erratically, with jerks to the right and left.  it was first viewed at maybe a 1/2 mile into the air, and while viewing it, an aircraft angled toward it.  my brother, nephew and niece dismissed it as "just a light" when we viewed it behind objects, only to see it move from behind them. this is the second sighting of this ufo, according to my brother, who saw it the night before.  i am normally skeptical of such events, but being unable to dismiss it as a natural or man-made occurrence, i can only classify it as ufo.
content.summary: Orange light ufo in brunswick ga

content.detailedDescription:
Warrensburg mo. middle of the afternoon. maybe 50 people in and out of cars staring up at a circular disk. it was silver and had circulating light around perimeter.
we noted several cars pulled over to the edge of semi-rural road. almost no one got out of the car. it was above all of our heads, motionless, making no noise. the lights were blinking continuously. it was very unnerving. we didn't know, at the time, what we were looking at. we watched for 10-15 minutes. nothing more happened while we were watching. we eventually, continued on home. we were in the air force. we were married a short time. i was 18, hubby was 20. we did not know what we were looking at. 
the next day, my husband, who was military police back then, saw a large burned circular mark on one of the runways. they were all told never to speak about it or tell anyone about it. we didn't back then. but as soon as he told me about what had happened at the air force base, we both knew what we had seen. we could never forget it. so far it's been 45 years.
content.summary: Daylight sighting, seen by maybe 50 people, no one knew exactly what they were looking at, at that time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was filling my car with gas at the shell station located at 3100 jfk boulevard in north little rock. i was standing between the gas pump and my car under the awning covering the pump area.

i began hearing a loud, and i do mean loud, constant low bass noise coming from the sky. i stepped in a northerly direction to get out from under the awning, which was blocking my view of the sky and looked up. i continued looking at the sky for a minute or two and did not see anything.

then i saw 3 aircraft flying about as high as i think the human eye could detect them. they were triangular in shape and flying in a triangular formation. they were dark green or gray in color. i'll continue with the story in a just a moment. i need to digress briefly.

i told my husband about what i had seen when we were both home late afternoon. he went to the computer and showed me various images. the image of the b2 bomber looked similar to the 3 planes in formation.

i was curious about what the 3 planes were, but they are not the subject of this report. what was following them is the subject of this report.

right behind the 3 planes was something i couldn't exactly determine the color of. it may have had a silver reflection to it, but at the altitude these 3 planes were, it was difficult to get a lot of detail. the weather was partly sunny with some clouds in the sky.

what i found very strange about this whatever that was following the squadron was its pattern of flying. it was flying north, just like the 3 planes. however, it was moving back and forth right to left, left to right as it flew north. the movement reminded me of a pendulum on an old-time clock. imagine the lowest point on the clock's pendulum as a dot and then follow that dot as the pendulum moves back and forth. that's about what it looked like. the loud roar continued for several minutes after the 3 planes and the whatever were out of sight.

this is not the first ufo i have ever seen. i remember the event very clearly but don't remember the exact date. it was about june 26, 1992, could have been july.

i was driving south on college avenue in fayetteville, arkansas. i was stopped at a stoplight just north of downtown fayetteville. i believe i was next to washington regional medical center on the right and across from evelyn hills shopping center on the left. it was pouring rain. visibility was maybe a mile or so. it was dark and cloudy. this would have been about 7:45 in the morning. i was driving to work.

there is a row of hills/mountains visible to the south when you are stopped at this stoplight. i saw something oval-shaped. it would have been gray or silver in color. the most striking thing about this object is that the bottom half of it looked like it was illuminated with a bright white light. remember what the weather is like at the time.

this thing was flying se so smoothly, it was like it was on invisible rails in the sky. there were no reports of anything in the news about it. again, years later my husband showed me some ufo films on tv and there was one that was exactly like what i saw.
content.summary: Something following suspected formation of 3 b2 bombers

content.detailedDescription: I had just went out on my back deck to smoke.It gets dark here around 5:30 and this was after 7 so it was already dark outside.I was looking at all the airplanes in the sky(i live near an airport so they are bountiful around here)and out of the corner of my eye,i caught a very bright disc-shaped object to the right of the sky.When i caught sight of it, it was so bright and traveling so fast, i knew it wasn't a plane.It went northeast in a straight completely horizontal line and almost instantly, it was poof, gone.It totally disappeared.I watched for about 7 seconds total.I stood outside and searched the skies for about 5 more minutes, hoping it would return.I felt such an overwhelming feeling of awe and awareness...I have always believed without proof...And now i have it.
content.summary: High velocity disc-shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
*                      * but you could tell of the sillouette was oval and ufo shapped like..Blemp like shape.



  *  *  *     ufo :i video taped and have disappearing on tape.In space...
     *    
this is the ufo i photographed..I was out looking for the guy that was drunk and hollering at the ufo?  i also photographed another ufo..I have been visited by three of them or more? i haven't been taken but i am glad that i haven't been or just don't have a vivid memory of it.I am glad that i don't also. i have 2 other pictures that show that wormholes are real and have nothing to do with blackholes???Duaaa....It has everything to do with gravitaional pull and forces of gravitation..If there is a beam of power placed at one time and place can open a rift in time and space that can be travelled. and landed safely..It has to do with a beam of power that is so confinned that it can cut a slice out of time and space.When time and space is actually one of the same. and points of tnterest will be the address of the future..To find and use the wormholeswill be a thing of the future generations.I don't have enough time to even phlosify as to how to start. but technology will advance and realize that change will be evident to even experiment on such a level? only the government will have access to such technology.As to the cost of operation and upkeep..D.W.Howerton industrial wiring technition..
content.summary: It had 2 lights and looked (dark-black)lights beeing on the outer edges of the ship..

content.detailedDescription: About right before sundown i was outside walking to my mail box saw a large fire ball in the sky. i later went out side with my video camera and captured the fire in the sky comming down and at first thought they were metorites, but after the objects went back up i changed my mind.I had the tape put on local news. i went back out the next night,and nights after that to keep picking up strange crafts on tape. the saga has been going on from june 15, 2009 untill the preasent day. the tapes speak for their sleves. i have sent them by ronald. please write me and tell me what you think of tnis.   i for one am lost for worlds.The objects left in the same way the came.                                                                                            thank you
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Fireball,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Greenish brown crafts  bright lights landing and takeing off  differant  kinds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in the evening after work. the sun was setting behind me as i was driving east on oakley rd., toward empire ave. as i was driving i had the radio off and i was talking to myself like usual. i suddenly knotice a white scuffle in the sky to the left of my view through the front window. it was a calm day no wind. in my mind i automaticly thought it was a plastic bag (white grocery store plastic bag) flying through the air.  as i aproached the stop sign at live oak. my eyes caught view of it again as i relised it was not as close as i thought it was. quickly my mind did a flip and i stopped at the stop sign and really looked. it was a cloud in the blue sky all by itself and it was making a swirling motion. it was as though something was comming into this demention from another. it was static in motion, it was kindof bouncing around like it was struggling. after about maybe ten seconds of watching it do this a shape appeared out of the swirling clouds. it was the same color of the white swirling cloud. it was large and had pointed ends to both sides. walnut shape and as large as three air force cargo plane, like the kind i usually see flying in the area from travis air force base. to me this was like a flying city. it came down from the atmosphere. the swirling cloud disapated. the disc flew at speeds i've never seen before before. it travel a distance of over 50 miles in less than a minute. i was stopped in my car at the stop sign but i started to travel forward because someone drove up behind me. i drove slowly toward empire road and watch it. above me was blue sky but where the disc headed was cloudy off in the horizon. the clouds where getting pinkish but where still white from the setting sun. as the craft headed toward the clouds i came to the stop light at empire road and i just stared at it. the disc came to a full stop right before it came to the cloud and then entered it slowly. i never saw it again but i wish i had a camera phone then. i was very amazed at how it cloaked itself with its environment. i later told my family they laughed but knew i was serious. but its not the only time i've seen strange things. my feelings when i saw it was i knew what it was and i then relised alot of the stuff i've been hearing is true. after i saw it it didn't really change me it was more like a matter of fact and i went on with my life as normal. it is what it is a whole lot of stuff i don't know but would be fascinating to know. i would send a sketch but don't have computer capability. the disc flew toward stockton in my opinion, stange because they always seem to fly that way.
content.summary: Walnut shape disc, color fuzzy white like clouds like it was a camo, very fast,

content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to email you while i remembered: (i seem to keep forgetting)
last night me and my 11 year old daughter were going to the store (joey's pizza) and i looked up first while driving and saw a very large triangular shape, gold in color, dropping out of the clouds. it was v shaped.  then after that on the other side of the sky was a multicolored same shape object (very large). i didn't get the chills looking at that one that i got with the first. it was amazing! my daughter saw it also. this is not the first time i have seen a ufo. i made it in the ufo magazine 16 years ago. it was about this time of year i saw it then. same shape. just a'lot bigger this time.
my daughter said i should have taken a picture with my phone, but it just didn't enter my mind at the time i was seeing it.
i have told no one about this, but i am positive other's would have had to have seen it also, it was very large in size.
content.summary: gold triangular object (large)

content.detailedDescription: 1:30 am. jan/14/2010.Opened door ,noticed diamond shape brightly lit green object falling towards earth..Was 1/2 mile  away and is was 100 feet above trees ..Until it fell below trees and lost sight of it
content.summary: Bright green iluminated...100 feet above trees 1/2 mile away...Falling to ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Energy "orb" sphere sighting :: gulf breeze fl !

hi i'm a homeowner / observer from .... yep, gulf breeze fl .. i wish to remain anonymous for obvious reasons.  i have a report on a recent sighting that should match up with other reports in the area.  i'm confident at least 50-100 people would have seen the same thing, to include my neighbor as a witness.
.. taking out the trash at approx 5:40pm jan 13, 2010.. looking north from "midway" towards escambia bay, i saw a bright white/orange-tinted ( about -6 magnitude brightness ) spherical light-form traveling east from garson point bridge towards eglin afb's west boundary at a rate of approx 500knts.  as it approached the middle of the bay, about 3-4 secs since i noticed the object, it made a downward 180 degree turn at the same rate of speed.  i dropped the garbage bag in the driveway, and knew that what i was seeing was not anything in our publicly known aviation inventory. my view was obscured from about 15 degrees from the horizon to the top of the treeline to my north. the object would dive below and above the trees moving in a very similar pattern as a dragonfly. after approx. 2 minutes of viewing i was able to signal my neighbor to be a witness.. after about a minute or two the object shot skyward from it's last position below the treeline as if it were staying in a particular piece of airspace in the middle of the bay, approx 1/2 mile wide and below 4000ft.  i should also mention there was a thin cloud layer around 5000ft which helped me judge the distance and scale of the light sphere.  at times the object would traverse and incredible speeds, well in excess of mach2-3 without breaking the sound barrier and without making any audible sound from approx 1mi away.  traffic from hwy98 was audible as well as several single engine recreational aircraft off in the distance, west and south of the activity, approx 8-15 miles. the last maneuver the object made was from west to east it climbed to approx 4000ft, turned north, zig-zagged in an s pattern and vanished after the 3rd zag, not to be seen again.   
shortly after a single rotor helicopter came on site ( pursuit ) from west to east along the original path of the sphere, and and turned north toward whiting field nas.  no other aircraft approched the area except for a commercial flight leaving pns traveling north-east, which tells me the airspace was not locked down.  i was under the impression that this object wanted to show-off and be seen.  also another observation was 3 satellites at 90 degrees elevation, magnitude about +4, intersecting directly above shortly after the sighting.

i'm still in awe over this observation.  i'm very familiar with military aviation and aeronautical engineering.  this sphere was defying our physics somehow by moving through the atmosphere at those speeds without disturbing the air.  most impressive.
content.summary: Fresh gulf breeze fl sighting over escambia bay

content.detailedDescription: For many years i have experienced many strange and unusual events. as a small child i can recall being visited by a tall gray that seemed to be feminine in stature.I was never sure if it was real or just a dream.But through out the years i have had many ufo sightings with several other witnesses to back up my claims. i have always thought that something has been going on in my life to which i cannot explain. for the past several months i have had a very strange feeling that something significant is going to happen. lately i have been awakened by dreams of flying and every time i look at the alarm clock it has been a series of numbers..Example 1:11am 3:33am 4:44am.I am not by any means claiming to have been abducted i am just trying to put my stories out there for someone who can contact me and assure me that there is some truth behind the abduction theory.But this most recent event has caused some distress. on january 11,2010 at exactly 3:33am i awoke from yet another dream of flying.I then got up to use the bathroom when i passed by the mirror and noticed 3 fairly large trails of blood that were still moist but dried to my right arm. as i wiped the blood off i noticed 3 perfect punctures marks in the ink of my one tattoo.They were perfectly spaced apart and definitely puncture marks.As i ran my finger across them i could feel the divots and now i can feel something under the skin. there has not been any inflammatory response and i have noticed 2 larger punctures above the original 3. i am hoping that someone else can help me understand what is going on. i apologize for putting my suspected abduction case on this site but i have documented some of my ufo stories on here and did not know where else to go for answers. please if anyone has info please contact me at alienx38@comcast.Net.. thank you..
content.summary: Possible abduction ?

content.detailedDescription: We met for dinner at a local restaurant. after dinner my husband took my mother home and in a different car to go to the grocery store about a mile from our home. as i was pulling up to the grocery i saw something that i thought was a helicopter because it was hovering over the ditch in the back of the store. i thought it might be a police helicopter but then it did a 90 degree turn and started moving slowly above us. i am not good with distance so i asked my daughter if she thought it was a football field up in the air...She said "no" it looked like it was 1/2 football field up in the air so that would be about 50 yards then.  it was the size of a normal fixed wing passenger jet but this had an extremely thin fuselage and there were no markings and it just glided overhead with no sound. i don't know how it could glide because it was so big and then it took off and started to fly through the neighborhood and then i started to drive in the direction it was going.  as i spotted this thing though i called my husband and he said "do you see what i see?" i said how could i ... i was at heb and he was on our block which is about a mile away. he was seeing the exact same thing over our block.  anyway, i followed the one that i saw for about twenty minutes and then went home.  as i was going home i saw four of them just hovering in the neighborhood in a stair stepped pattern.  i realize that since i live in a military town that it was probably some sort of military exercise.  we have had friends mention that they have seen similar aircraft at various times and have been just as freaked out as we were.  the strange thing though is i called the police, the airport, local radio and television stations and none of them were interested.  four of us saw this thing so i know it isn't something i just dreamed up... not to mention other friends have seen it too in other locations.  i cannot find anything that looks like it on the internet.  i had my phone with me but didn't even think to take a picture of it because i was so blown away.  i now keep a camera with me in case i ever seen anything remotely like it or even remotely strange again.
content.summary: White fixed wing plane with very thin fuselage and no markings

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a security officer on a chicken processing plant.  i believe it was around 20:00 hours,i was thanking about u.F.O.S, i has a very strong gut feeling to contact my mother, who is a resident at a hightrise building on alburn ave located at martin luther king historical district.  when my mother answered the phone, she sounded very excited,she said boy you need to come over here and see this.  she was looking out of the window of her 14 floor apartment, she notice a star like object moving in and out of the clouds.  i asked my mother when did take place, she inform me that it was happening as we speak.  i asked my mother what is the object doing now, she said that there is a human looking figure sitting in the object looking down at her.  my mother said that every time she would look up at the figure, it would bend forward to look at her.  my mother said that another similar object came out of the clouds and hovered next to the other. the two object hovered there for a while, then move off back into the clouds.  i remember my mother said that this happen two night.  my personal feeling is, that what my mother saw that night was real.
content.summary: The object seem by my mother was star like.

content.detailedDescription: Dont know just got pics back and this was on it want to see if you can  look at it and tell us what you think.
content.summary: My mom took this pic at our vacation last week in pigeon forge

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were coming home from my moms house in pennsyvania.  we went route 95 which takes you past the jefferson memorial.  we were on a bridge crawling in traffic.  stop and go.  my daughter who was 9 at the time says, look at that plane up there.  i looked and i didn't see a plane, i was in navy at the time and i worked on aircraft.  about 2 o'clock i saw a very large, silver, cigar shaped flying object, moving very slow.  it was moving from my right ot the left.  i watched the object, it was above a hill which was right in front of us.  it didn't move fast, nice staedy speed. it moved above the hill till it got right in front of us.  it stopped for a few seconds, then shot straight up in the air and was gone. i said wow! i mean anybody that looked up saw it.  the bridge was packed with cars.
content.summary: Large, long cigar shape over washington dc.  stopped then shot straight up.
